Name: Chōkai
Fate: Scuttled after gunfire/bomb damage in Battle off Samar, 25 October 1944
Range: 8,000 nautical miles (15,000 km) at 14 knots (26 km/h)
Armament:
10 × 20 cm/50 3rd Year Type naval guns,
4 × Type 89 12.7 cm (5 in) guns,
up to 66 Type 96 25 mm (0.98 in) AA guns,
8 × 61 cm tubes for the Type 93 torpedo
